channel.title: Mingw on The Road
channel.description: Recent content in Mingw on The Road

item.title: Create an import library for building application in MinGW
item.description: Yesterday I modified an existing c++ application for Windows. And its default build environment is Makefile and MinGW. However I used a newly Windows API that is not included by header files of MinGW. First of all, I copied the constant definition from header file of Windows SDK, and defined the Windows API method as a extern C method. So it’s no problem to compile the code in MinGW. Secondly I have to fix the link issue.
